Package name.cantanima.chineseremainderclock

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TimeEntryDialogListener
    Created by cantanima on 8/22/17.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Chinese_Remainder
    The main Activity for the clock! This is the main Activity that controls the clock.
    Chinese_Remainder.PlaceholderFragment
    A placeholder fragment containing a simple view.
    Clock_Drawer
    Draws the clock.
    CRC_Animation
    Controls animation of the clock.
    CRC_Preferences  
    CRC_Prefs_Activity  
    CRC_Quiz
    Created by cantanima on 8/22/17.
    CRC_View
    Custom View for a Chinese Remainder Clock In order to facilitate modularity without replacing the view every time, drawing the view is subcontracted to the Clock_Drawer class.
    CRC_View_Archy_Fade  
    CRC_View_Arcy
    This class extends Clock_Drawer for the Archy design, a circular design that highlights an arch to show the correct remainder.
    CRC_View_Bubbly
    This class extends Clock_Drawer for the Bubbly design, a polygonal design that highlights the number of balls corresponding to the correct remainder.
    CRC_View_Linus
    This class extends Clock_Drawer for the Linus design, a polygonal design that highlights the number of line segments corresponding to the remainder.
    CRC_View_Ringy
    This class extends Clock_Drawer for the Bally design, a circular design that moves a ball to show the correct remainder.
    CRC_View_Shady
    This class extends Clock_Drawer for the Shady design, a polygonal design that varies the shade of a polygon in a manner corresponding to the remainder.
    CRC_View_Vertie
    This class extends Clock_Drawer for the Vertie design, a polygonal design that rotates a point around a polygon, to the position corresponding to the remainder.
    CRC_Webview
    Created by cantanima on 4/26/17.
    HelpActivity
    An example full-screen activity that shows and hides the system UI (i.e.
    Quiz_WhatTimeIsIt
    Created by cantanima on 8/22/17.
    TimeEntryDialog
    Used to obtain user's input in a "What time is it?" quiz.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CRC_View_Ringy.DRAGGED_BALL
    counter for which ball is being dragged
    CRC_View.Modification
    How to determine the time when re-drawing the clock.
    CRC_View.Units
    which unit is being modified (Manual mode only)
